laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Severe hyperammonemia detected again during relapse in February 2021.
Increased serum levels during relapse in February 2021.
Increased serum levels during relapse in February 2021.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Increased proportions and counts of monocytes and atypical lymphocytes.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased proportions of lymphocytes and elevated counts of atypical lymphocytes during relapse.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Low levels of total proteins, mainly due to decreased levels of the gamma globulins fraction, with reduced IgG and slightly increased IgM.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Consistently showed reduced levels of the gamma globulins fraction during relapse, with reduced IgG and increased IgM again.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal counts of NK and B cells; significantly higher counts of T cells, mainly due to increased CD4+ T cell subset.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Further T cell subset analysis revealed alterations in naїve, central memory, effector memory, and terminally differentiated effector memory cells.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Significantly reduced levels of IFNγ, IL-17A, and TNFα; higher levels of IL-10.
